Package io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.data.recipe

Class CookingRecipeBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.TypedJsonObject
io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.data.recipe.RecipeBuilder<CookingRecipeBuilder>
io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.data.recipe.CookingRecipeBuilder
public final class CookingRecipeBuilder extends RecipeBuilder<CookingRecipeBuilder>
Builder for cooking recipes (namespace:recipes/id.json). Used for all types of cooking (smelting, blasting, smoking, campfire_cooking).
See Also:
